description: This recipe for a Moscow Mule combines apple cider and vodka for a perfect balance of sweet and tangy. It also features ginger beer which provides the spicy kick that makes this drink memorable.
keywords: Spiced Apple Cider Moscow Mule Recipe
Spiced Apple Cider Moscow Mule Cocktail
Spiced Apple Cider Moscow Mule Cocktail Recipe
How To Spiced Apple Cider Moscow Mule
name: Spiced Apple Cider Moscow Mule
recipeIngredient: 1 oz. Fireball whiskey or cinnamon-infused alcohol
Apple slices and cinnamon sticks for garnish

recipeInstructions.name: Fill a copper mug with ice and add ginger beer, apple cider, whiskey, and rum.
